column4: Hey everyone... Can someone please tell me what might cause a laptop (compaq presario 2250) to stall at the following screen while trying to boot from a freshly burnt ubuntu 10.04 netbook iso... http://www.magiceffects.geek.nz/pics/ubuntufail.jpg
if you press a key does something happen?
try rebooting and as SOON as you see that screen press a key (hopefully you'll get a menu with boot options)
space maybe?  i don't think it matters (could be wrong)
i'd recommend you start by trying F6 and setting nomodeset and see if that boots correctly
